summary: Build a News page/form with improved date entry UX (no autofill, clear month/day/year guidance) and a PIN-gated Options panel supporting adding news and a guided remove-news workflow (select item and submit removal).

existing_features.title: Remove the date autofill control from the News entry form so users can no longer auto-populate month/day/year with today's date.
Add clear helper text near the date inputs on the News entry form to distinguish Month, Day, and Year (English user-facing text).
After the user enters the correct PIN, show an Options UI (titled "Option") that provides two selectable choices: "Add News" and "Remove News", instead of immediately opening the Add News form.

Implement a Remove News flow: when "Remove News" is selected, show a section titled "Remove a Newspaper" with a control to choose which existing news item (text/article) to remove, and a submit action that removes it from the backend and updates the list.
Add backend support for deleting a news item and expose it to the frontend via a new React Query mutation hook used by the Remove News flow.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove the date input autofill option.
Add helper text to clarify the date format (distinguish month/day/year) near the date input.
After entering the PIN, show an 'Option' section with two choices: 'Add News' and 'Remove News'.
Implement 'Remove News' flow: clicking it reveals a 'Remove a Newspaper' section with a selector to choose which text/news item to remove and a submit action to confirm removal.

projectName: News page: remove date autofill, clarify date format, and add PIN-gated Options panel with Remove News workflow
